item.title: Azure Firewall NAT Behaviors
item.description: Introduction The Azure Firewall is a cloud-native and intelligent network firewall security service that can be integrated into many different use cases. It’s a fully stateful firewall as a service with built-in high availability and unrestricted cloud scalability that provides both east-west and north-south traffic inspection. Depending on how traffic will flow through the Azure Firewall, there are expected NAT behaviors.
